Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to back up the statement that Donald Trump said Barack Obama wrote the emoluments clause of the Constitution.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Donald Trump did not make such a statement during his appearance on Fox News or in the linked op-ed story.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Donald Trump made the statement based on a fake quote, which is not supported by any reliable source or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Vox, stating that while Trump called the emoluments clause "phony," he did not claim that Obama wrote it.
